fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Commit grand theft auto and steal a player's car.
- During the day, give a car to another player. Only usable if you have more than one car.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- All players start the game with a car.
- Players who have a car are able to target players as normal.
- Players who lack a car can only target their direct neighbors with any abilities and attributes that they have.
- Evil players who lack a car and target a player who has a car will steal that player's car, in addition to their normal abilities and attributes.
- Having more than one car does nothing besides safeguard a player against having their car stolen, as a player can only steal one car in a night.
- If multiple players attempt to steal a car from the same player who does not have enough cars to steal, the players who steal a car are randomized, though you will always have priority in stealing a car.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Take down the town through various crimes.
